docTitle.titlePart:
Determination of a High Potential Barrier Hindering Internal
Rotation from the Analysis of the Ground State Spectrum :
The Case of Ethyl Cyanide

byline.docAuthor: D. Boucher, A. Dubrulle, and J. Demaison

byline.affiliation:
Laboratoire do Spectroscopic Hertzienne, Laboratoire associe au CNRS n° 249,
University de Lille I
Abteilung Chemische Physik im Institut für physikalische Chemie der Universität Kiel

front.div:
The ground state rotational spectrum of ethyl cyanide has been reinvestigated between 8 and
250 GHz. The barrier potential V3 is calculated from 11 high «/, ground state transitions which
were found split into doublets. V3 is 3007 cal/mole, assuming 7 a = 3.167uA 2 and £ ( i, a ) =
48.65°. The splittings of the K-doublet transitious have also been analyzed.
